item_category: A medium size 4G phone with a big screen! Enjoy every detail of your movies and internet on the go with this stunning 5.72 HD, 18:9 ratio IPS display. Surprisingly compact due to the narrow bezel, this phone is barely any bigger than most 5 phones! Features include; 1.4GHz quad core processor, 1GB RAM, 16GB storage, 2 cameras, GPS, fingerprint sensor, Blue tooth 4.2LE, Android 8.1 Oreo Go.
review_title: Really great piece of kit for the price
A lot of phone for the money
This phone is a good value for money.
Is very good and so easy to use
It does what it says on the tin.
Excellent phone, great screen and camera, Bargain
A good value for money given the specifications
This phone is easy to operate
It’s so nice smart mobile for daily use.
Amazing phone only pic quality ain't that good
A Nice Phone and Good size
Good size phone worth the money
The phone is ok but not keen on the slow charge
Nice phone , little slow on picking messenger up
Phone looks great and works brilliantly
My alba phone is good and fast
Alba phone a good all round mobile
Really good quality  also charges really quick
My phone is fab and works well im well impressed
Looks nice and easy to handle
Very good battery life. Excellent audio quality
Great phone ,does all the things i want
Phone works great no problems at all.
An attractive phone and value for money
It works very fast and has good functions
Nice phone but battery life very poor
Phone looks nice but waste of money
review_text:
I helped my older friend choose this phone for their first smart phone, its easy to use with few apps so not to confuse them, has all the basics they require, phone, text and Internet search with the facility for Google 
mail etc if they so wish. So far so good Only downside is its quite difficult to get a wallet case to precisely fit this phone.
Excellent,easy to use and understand,my husband and I both bought one,husband is disabled and this is the first phone he has managed to use alone.very clear, understandable, user friendly.
Well chuffed with it!!
Easy to use, looks like any other android, brought as a replacement for my stepdad and he finds it is very similar to his old phone
paid a lot more for phones no good but this one marvalous

Early days with this phone, but very pleased so far. Everything works well, the phone feels well built and comes with a gel backing case. Fitting the screen protector didn't go well so I've ordered a pouch case so I can protect the whole phone. Nice, large screen and it seems quick enough for everything I've tried so far, in including YouTube. I would say this a great value phone.
Good value for money as it performs the same way as the Samsung A10.

Works just fine, first time using an android phone, so takes a little getting used to.  It does the job for what I purchased it for which was too have as a second phone. Would recommend for an easy option if you need a smart phone.

I bought this for my dad who is in late 70s. He had never had a Smartphone before. And it is absolutely amazing. Very easy to use because of the large screen. Etc.

If your looking a phone with best camera, memory etc...then this probably isn't for you. But for a basic Smartphone. It's brilliant.

I purchased this phone as a second phone for work and I’m so glad that I did. I needed a smart phone that could be used for social media, emails and organising.

The long battery life is extremely helpful and it’s good that you can add extra memory via a memory storage card. 

The large screen is a special feature and would therefore be good for older users as well who need an easy, low maintenance phone.

I really like it because it got a back case as well and price wise it stands out,is moderate and everyone can afford it, actually Ive bought 2 of then one for my Mum as a gift and other was for my Sister in Ghana,they really love love it
For price it's  a very good phone easy to use and setup and has all updates more expensive phone's have
Good. A little slow at times. Does what I need it to do.
Very pleased with phone just what I needed no problems whatsoever
Ok for spare phone clear calling but slow as will not run certain apps. touch response ok, but on plus side comes with gel case and screen protector.
will not play all songs have to press play for every song
Its a great phone in price and works as I wanted
Good for the price. Nothing fancy but good.
We bought for my daughter for her birthday and she is so happy with it .
Great phone, does everything I need it to do for the price.
Great little phone as a spare. Wifes phone sent off for repair so got this one and works a treat!

This is a good phone for the price. I bought for my niece last month.  She has had many expensive phones over the years which haven't lasted. This one is half the price and she is very happy with it. Good size screen for YouTube an the usal teenager needs!! The delivery was fast and so a great service all round
Was pleasntly surpriesd how good this phone was for the price, and even came with clear rubber protective cover,  Love it
The phone specifications and size is superb and I think it was a good value for mony

Easy to use and very intuitive phone.  Very good battery life.  Decent camera.
Decent screen resolution. 
Reasonable price for such decent phone.
This phone is great for somebody getting into tech. Bought it my mother-in-law as her first smart phone, and she's getting on great.
Only let down is battery life which is rubbish everything else ok trying to fina a higher capacity battery is impossible it would help if argos support told you what phone this model is based on
It was a great Christmas present for my daughters
I have nothing bad to report to date of purchasing this phone, forget the others especially apple, apple spend a lot on advertising, the lower brands are just as good. Trust me.
I bought these for my 6 and 7 year old just so they could "have a phone" no sim cards in though and they love them especially to play stuff with each other and their older siblings

This phone has been bought for my Dad who is in his 70's. I'm impressed with the screen size, the way the phone works, and the general layout. A handy screen protector and clear plastic cover were included. Dad has not used the phone yet, but I do not anticipate any issues because the phone is very user-friendly. Seems good value for money.
The price was good for the quality of the phone would highly recommend
Wanted a decent but cheap and SIM free smartphone for my son who has a terrible frecord of losing or breaking phones. This has done the job perfectly.
Cheap phone with limited options

This phone is almost on par withe a iPhone
at 1/4 of the price.
I found it so nice and convenient smart mobile for daily use.
Works great can do the basics and has enough memory to download a couple of apps.
Excellent item a must buy for all
Maybe the fact that i had a faulty phone but this phone wasn't worth the money. In the end I upgraded to a motoralo and have had no problems since
No problems with this phone for basic use (calls, sms, facebook, twitter, messenger, various travel apps and some web surfing) other than battery life being a bit shorter than expected.
Worst phone ever, everything takes so long to open. Almost smashed it a few times out of frustration
Good product, worth the money
Excellent value much better quality than expected
great value for money, very easy to use. all in all a very good purchase.

So far I am very happy with it although I did find it tricky to set up
because of the 2 SIM card space idea but once I did it has worked 
fine.
The phone isn't very good, as phone overheats and I've lost receipt
Great phone only problem I have is the Google bar on front doesn't move so covers my photo

I really love this phone so good for casual use and networking and data signals are really good.
Speakers and the screen are absolutely beautiful. Also love the fingerprint sensor at the back for unlocking the phone and other use.
The only downside of this product is that the battery runs out really quickly on heavy usage and have to carry a portable charger with me everywhere.

On buying felt like a good deal but that is about it. Once out of box, battery lasted about 2 hours and needed charging again. Not only that whenever my fiancee made a call it started burning up and we had no option but to return it to shop and be issued with a refund. Only time I've had to return an item but disappointing never the less

This is a good budget phone. Has a lot of features that more expensive phones don't. The phone is actually dark blue as opposed to black as stated. Battery life not brilliant but recharges fast. Phone does tend to heat up when charging though.
A brilliant phone and the phone is still a good phone
Good wee android phone accesses Internet quickly
The phone is ok but disappointed in the charging as it takes ages and soon runs out of charge
This mobile phone is nice enough to be recommended.
Good phone for the price ,bit slow on picking up messages& messenger

This phone was bought to replace faulty Cubot J3Pro. It looks, sounds and behaves EXACTLY the same, but the good thing being that it's not faulty. 
Great value, great product, would certainly recommend buying this android phone
Amazing great value woild deffo recomend

The Alba 57 is a good phone for a budget smartphone. It has a good clear big screen, so is easy to read texts, surf the web and for playing games/streaming videos. It also has the added features of a fingerprint scanner and dual sim  card slots. The only thing that lets it down is that the battery doesn't last long, especially after heavy use. Would recommend the phone.
I like it and I think it worth the price ... I will  recommend it to anyone

The phone is easy to use, has a good rear and front facing camera, storage is enough for the apps I use. 

Isn't compatible for Instagram

Don't leave it charging on a bed sheet cotton material 
Charge it in a surface or unit 
Screen protect protects screen if you drop it 
And also phone case has a sturdy grip
Decent phone for money
All great I love it love it
Took it back.too big.seemed out of proportion,long but not that wide.didnt like the look of size
Nice to handle, smart look

Quick to setup, very crisp audio quality. The battery life is good (two days on normal use).
Love the camera quality.

Lacks some of the offer sensors such as magnetism, air pressure, but I don't need them.

The screen quality is nice, I tend to use it with the brightness set very low, but it can go very bright.
had a Alcatel xl before this phone and this up loads quickly but the google take a bit getting used too

This was bought for my 13 year old daughter in replacement of the Argos Bush spira D5.5 after it malfunctioned. This phone is brilliant. It’s big and good looking. Camera is spot on for my daughter to do her TikTok vids. Fingerprint sensor is good to unlock. Some functions work better than my iPhone 7plus. I’d definitely consider buying this phone when my contract is up. Excellent price and excellent phone. 

Front is black and the back is dark blue 

Thanks Argos

This phone well worth the money.  Bought  for  someone  that's not  very  good with  phones. It's easy to use nice  bright  screen camera  is also good takes  lovely  photos. Also comes  with phone case and screen  protector. The phone is sim free so can  use any  sim the phone.
Viewed the phone before buying it ,excellent customer service , the phone is easy to use and has all the apps you need
Phone works perfect. Love the finger print as not good with remembering passwords

I love the look and feel and size of the phpne but when it comes to battery even with screen brightness right down and all app's stopped that can be from running in background the battery is terrible, ive just taken off charge so was at 100% about 10 mins checking email's and fb and its now on 58%, if i play a game it drains even faster. Candy crush and some similar games arent compatible with phone.

This phone was purchased for an older relative, who was looking for a device with a good size screen, nice weight and useful camera.  The user was already familiar with Android and so this phone represents good value for money for the price-point and the functionality required..
The clarity of the screen its size are real plus points at this price point and after 2 weeks of use, the recipient of the phone is very happy indeed.

I am very satisfied about the phone because it has many functions and I am able to use many apps in this because as it has storages and ram enough for downloading. I will also recommend this phone to my family and friends so they can buy better phones from Argos.

The pictures aspects of the phone not clear
They should update the quality of the camera 
Apart from camera problem l'am very ok with the phone

Battery life is awful, doesn't connect to other Bluetooth devices, doesn't cast to smart TV, very very slow, freezes, kicks you out if apps I cannot stress enough how bad d this phone is, buy at your peril, it's the worst smart phone I've ever had

Battery life very poor, having to charge three times a day.
Nice phone, but a bit slow at loading apps etc

I do not recommend this phone to anybody the battery overheats whilst on the phone when you're on the internet it keeps throwing you back to main screen all round phone is not very good I would not recommend this phone to anybody waste of money
Excellent I will recommend it to my friends.
Does what a phone does and then some.. Great value for money.
Good phone good price
